message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this exceptional product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm initially suggesting a price of $2,200,000. I believe this represents a fair starting point for our discussion.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,600,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value and my budget.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $1,900,000. This reflects the true worth of what's being offered.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1,700,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the original value you mentioned.
